definition: can be enjoyed by scholars and lay-people alike (idiom)

custom/convention/popular/common/coarse/vulgar/secular

sentences.english: Good literature and art works should suit both refined and popular tastes.
sentences.chinese: 优秀的文艺应该是雅俗共赏的。

sentences.english: Study on the origin of tea culture;
sentences.chinese: 茶文化雅俗共赏，具有广泛的社会性。

sentences.english: Shakespeare was a great master of the English language at all its levels.
sentences.chinese: 莎士比亚是运用雅俗共赏的英语的大师。

sentences.english: But one supreme pleasure that spans all people is laughter.
sentences.chinese: 但是有一样极致的乐趣雅俗共赏，那就是欢笑。

sentences.english: Let's find sth. that highbrows and lowbrows alike can enjoy.
sentences.chinese: 怎样才能雅俗共赏才好。

sentences.english: And he and actor Zhao Benshan perform during the concert.
sentences.chinese: 期间，演员赵本山也助阵朗朗的演奏会，雅俗共赏。

sentences.english: The tea culture, which is a very refined and popular culture carries widely a social nature.
sentences.chinese: 茶文化雅俗共赏，具有广泛的社会性。
